title: League Client
body: Every so often, about every 4 games, I get a message syaing lol client is not responding. It only happens in champ select and forces me to dodge. It just started happening this patch. My lp is dripping down the drain because of me dodging.Someone help

replies.body: I'd like to help with this but need some more information!  Can you explain to me what is happening or observing when the message shows up?  What does the error message say exactly?  For some examples, are you modifying your masteries in champion select then see the message?  Did you try to open up Hextech Crafting while waiting in queue?  These details could help!
